item.title: Work with R objects in your model
item.description: About This model doesnâ€™t really accomplish anything useful. I coded this up to show how we can get vector, matrix data as well as R functions into your simulation. After we show the model code, we walk through the key lines of code and explain why / where this type of extension could be useful. Documentation You can find documentation for functions in mrgx plugin here: http://mrgsolve.
